## Setup

```{r setup}
library(targets)
library(tidyverse)

# Set the target storage folder to "_targets"
tar_config_set(store = here::here("_targets"))

source(here::here("R/functions.R"))

lipidomics <- tar_read(lipidomics)
```

## Results:

### Basic stats table

```{r}
tar_read(table_descriptive_stats) |> knitr::kable(caption = "The mean and standard deviation of metabolites in the lipidomics dataset.")
```

### Distribution plot

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "Distribution of metabolites in the lipidomics dataset."
tar_read(plot_distributions)
```

### Figure of model estimates

```{r}
tar_read(plot_model_results)
```

## Appendix

```{r}
tar_read(model_results) |>
  knitr::kable(caption = "Logistic regression model results for all metabolites in the lipidomics dataset.")
```
